show_name: The Disastrous Life of Saiki K. (TV)
other_title: La Vida Desastrosa de Saiki K. (Spanish)
plot: Saiki Kusuo, an otherwise normal teenager, has various super-powers, telepathy and telekinesis included. This should have been cool, but through experience, Saiki comes to realize that having powers while trying to lead an ordinary life is a bad mix. (from manga)
opening_theme: "Seishun wa Zankoku janai" (青春は残酷じゃない) by Natsuki Hanae
"Sai Psi Sai Kōchō!" (最Ψ最好調!) by Dempagumi, Inc.
ending_theme: "Psi desu I LIKE YOU" (Ψです I LIKE YOU) by Dempagumi.inc
